pr_title: [FLINK-17313]fix type validation error when sink table ddl exists column with precision of decimal/varchar

timeline.message: [FLINK-17313]fix type validation error when insert sink ddl wihich indicates precision of decimal/timestamp/varchar

timeline.bodyText: Lets just inline the last argument.
timeline.author: dawidwys
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -158,19 +158,33 @@ public static void checkPhysicalLogicalTypeCompatible(
 			String physicalFieldName,
 			String logicalFieldName,
 			boolean isSource) {
-		checkIfCompatible(
-			physicalFieldType,
-			logicalFieldType,
-			(cause) -> new ValidationException(
-				String.format(
-					"Type %s of table field '%s' does not match with " +
-						"the physical type %s of the '%s' field of the %s.",
+		if (isSource) {
+			checkIfCompatible(
+					physicalFieldType,
+					logicalFieldType,
+					(cause) -> new ValidationException(
+								String.format("Type %s of table field '%s' does not match with " +
+									"the physical type %s of the '%s' field of the %s.",
+										logicalFieldType,
+										logicalFieldName,
+										physicalFieldType,
+										physicalFieldName,
+										"TableSource return type"),

timeline.message: inline the last argument according to review comments
add tests to verfiy function work normal

timeline.bodyText:
What I meant is that we can inline the TableSource return type into the string. There is no reason for having it as an argument to String.format().:
(cause) -> new ValidationException(
	String.format("Type %s of table field '%s' does not match with " +
		"the physical type %s of the '%s' field of the TableSource return type.",
			logicalFieldType,
			logicalFieldName,
			physicalFieldType,
			physicalFieldName),
	cause));
timeline.author: dawidwys
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -169,8 +169,7 @@ public static void checkPhysicalLogicalTypeCompatible(
 										logicalFieldName,
 										physicalFieldType,
 										physicalFieldName,
-										"TableSource return type"),
-								cause));
+										"TableSource return type"), cause));
